content-provider.name: ammotestdriver
content-provider.description: Data schema for Ammo test driver messages.

field.name: test name
field.description: A text label for a given test, for convenience of a human user.

field.name: test item
field.description: A numerical index in a given test, for convenience of a human user.

field.name: exclusive enumeration
field.description: An exclusive enumeration list means that only one value is allowed

field.name: inclusive enumeration
field.description: An inclusive enumeration list means that any number of the values is allowed in a list.

field.name: content_checksum
field.description: For purposes of testing, a checksum of all the other fields.
